snippet: Despite the Obama administration’s best efforts, the lack of affordable housing remains one of America’s most vexing problems.
abstract: Editorial warns that lack of affordable housing remains one of America's most vexing problems, despite Obama administration's best efforts; calls on Congress to put money into National Housing Trust Fund, and on Pres Obama to spend political capital necessary to extract that money from Congress.
lead_paragraph: Despite the Obama administration’s best efforts, the lack of affordable housing remains one of America’s most vexing problems.

headline.seo: Fight for the Housing Trust Fund
headline.main: Fight for the Housing Trust Fund
headline.print_headline: Fight for the Housing Trust Fund
